UI_visible_response: Read 38 web pagesView Page DetailsThere are several individuals named Zhou Daiyu. Here are two notable ones:Zhou Daiyu in the field of petroleum engineering:He is a researcher who has contributed to the field of petroleum engineering. For example, he co-authored a paper titled "Factors Influencing Effective Storage Capacity of Abnormally-High-Pressure Water-Condensate Gas Reservoirs" published in 2021. He also participated in the research of a new method to calculate oil and gas upwelling velocity.Zhou Daiyu in the field of materials science and engineering:He is a professor and doctoral supervisor at the School of Materials Science and Engineering, Dalian University of Technology. He obtained his Ph.D. from Karlsruhe Institute of Technology in Germany. His research focuses on electronic functional materials and devices, including dielectric, piezoelectric, and ferroelectric materials and devices, as well as wide-bandgap ferroelectric semiconductor thin films, gene sequencing chip electrode films, resistive sensor films, and on-chip micro-supercapacitors.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: There are several individuals named Zhou Daiyu. Here are two notable ones:- **Zhou Daiyu in the field of petroleum engineering**:    - He is a researcher who has contributed to the field of petroleum engineering. For example, he co-authored a paper titled "Factors Influencing Effective Storage Capacity of Abnormally-High-Pressure Water-Condensate Gas Reservoirs" published in 2021[^6^]. He also participated in the research of a new method to calculate oil and gas upwelling velocity[^7^].- **Zhou Daiyu in the field of materials science and engineering**:    - He is a professor and doctoral supervisor at the School of Materials Science and Engineering, Dalian University of Technology. He obtained his Ph.D. from Karlsruhe Institute of Technology in Germany. His research focuses on electronic functional materials and devices, including dielectric, piezoelectric, and ferroelectric materials and devices, as well as wide-bandgap ferroelectric semiconductor thin films, gene sequencing chip electrode films, resistive sensor films, and on-chip micro-supercapacitors[^3^].
